And the "Longest Time in a CR" reward goes to.... *pulls a card from 
an envelope* Zergling!


::Squizzy::

Squizzy slid to a stop in front of the CR chamber, looking at it and 
seeing that Zergling was still in it, still in stasis lock. She shook 
her head typing in a series of commands. Several wires emerged from 
the inside walls of the CR, wrapping around Zergling's head.

Squizzy walked over to a console, tapping several buttons to initiate 
a reprogramming procedure. And enemy did something to Zergling before 
he got restrained, so it could have messed things up.
